description: The crypto world has become a place where

are stealing (yes stealing) money from honest people.  Father Pepe has been created to educate meme coin enthusiast and to exploit the evil developers of crypto.  We make no promises for returns or investments but we do make a promise to be upfront, honest and build a community that protects the crypto space from these rogue devs.  Join with us as we have fun and work continuously to protect the crypto space from these frauds.  We want to hear your stories so that others can learn from our mistakes.  Our plan is to constantly educate our community how to make wise decisions on coins to buy.  Lets take back the crypto meme space together.
